    • Method Detail

      • addReservation

        public void addReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Table> temptablelist)
        Adds the reservation. It will check for pax number, date, and then time It is also able to identify which component of the user's input is not appropriate
        Parameters:
        temptablelist - the list of tables

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation()
        Removes the reservation. Creates a temp ArrayList to check if user has more than 1 reservation made under the same contact number Allows user to decide which reservation to remove

      • checkReservation

        public void checkReservation()
        Check reservation. Creates a temp ArrayList to check if user has more than 1 reservation made under the same contact number

      • searchResList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> searchResList(long contno)
        Search reservation list using contact number as an identifier
        Parameters:
        contno - the contact number
        Returns:
        the array list of reservation indices in resList

      • checkAvailability

        public int checkAvailability(int pax,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime t,
                             boolean AM,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Table> tempTableList)
        Check availability.
        Parameters:
        pax - the pax
        t - the time
        AM - the boolean identifying whether it is AM or PM
        tempTableList - the list of table
        Returns:
        the tableID of available table

      • updateRes

        public void updateRes()
        Update reservation List. Checks and removes any reservations that are already 30 minutes past their indicated timing

      • getUnavailableTables

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getUnavailableTables()
        Gets the unavailable tables. Creates an ArrayList of Integers to store the tableIds of reserved tables
        Returns:
        the List of reserved tables

      • getReservations

        public java.util.List<Reservation> getReservations()
        Gets the reservations.
        Returns:
        the reservationsList

      • resetRes

        public void resetRes()
        Reset reservations List.

      • getCustReservations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> getCustReservations(long contno)
        Gets the reservations already made by the customer.
        Parameters:
        contno - the contno
        Returns:
        the reservations by the customer

      • activateReservation

        public int activateReservation()
        Activate reservation. Checks the reservation and converts it to become an order Allows the 'reserved' table to become 'occupied' Removes the reservation and updates the list
        Returns:
        the tableId of table that was reserved

      • isCurrentSession

        public boolean isCurrentSession(Reservation r)
        Checks if is current session.
        Parameters:
        r - the reservation to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if is current session

      • printAllReservations

        public void printAllReservations()
        Prints all the reservations.
